about_the_game:
Conflict of Lords is an Roguelite Anti-TD game. You will act as the Lord of Foe in Game Development Council, who decided to go his separate way due to a conflict. Invade the newly released game Village Guardian. Summon the Predators to destroy villages. Try your best to overthrow the Overlord!

Village Destroyer


The Lord of Foe can cost energy to summon predators to attack the village. It can also cast powerful spells to paralyze enemies, focus on specific target, deal area damage…

As powerful as the Lord of Foe is, it also has to play by the rules. While advancing on a fixed route, if Lord’s HP goes to 0, the game will come to an end. Summon your army to protect the Lord of Foe!

The hero avatars of mob players will randomly respawn in the battlefield and try to protect the village. Show them your powe!

One More Round


Clear stages and you can get new units, equipment, and skills. Make your own build with various units and an equipment. Every round is a different experience

Vivid Characters


Lords of the Game Development Council can always work together and bring marvellous games to the players…… Do they?


Variety of players: Rude Mage, Arrogant Archer and Wordy Warrior. It seems that they have their secrets?

Time to teach those players a lesson with the Lord’s power.

Features

  • Rougelite + Anti-TD + Auto Chess
  • 2D, bright cartoon art
  • Metastory
